Muji Mild Moisturizing Face Soap

Brand: Muji

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Palmitic Acid, Disodium Lauriminodiacetate, Glycol Distearate, Sodium PEG-4 Cocamide Sulfate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Lauramide DEA, Polyquaternium-7, Etidronic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA

id, Tetrasodium EDTA, Prunus Armeniaca Juice, Polyquaternium-51, Butylene Glycol, Prunus Persica Leaf Extract.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
